p: Statistics of sequences comparison was generated in a pairwise sequence comparison matrix ( Table 1 ). There was 96.08% identity between COVID-19 and SARS CoV Mpro, while low identity% of 51.61 was detected for COVID-19 and MERS CoV Mpro. The number of COVID-19 amino acid differences was 12 and 153 for SARS CoV and MERS CoV, respectively.
